abstract: Samir Handanović (born 14 July 1984) is a Slovenian footballer, who plays as a goalkeeper for Italian club Inter Milan and the Slovenia national football team. He played for Udinese between 2004 and 2012. During the course of the 2010–11 Serie A season, he has saved a total of six penalty shots, tying an all-time league record set in the 1948–49 season.Having previously represented Slovenia's under-19 and under-21 team, Handanović made his senior international debut in 2004. His older cousin Jasmin Handanović is also a goalkeeper who plays for the Slovenian national team.
